article_title: Guest columnist Laura M. Riddick says N.C. Registers of Deeds must follow the law on gay marriage
article_text:
How do you think the charges will affect Cosby’s legacy?

Story: Bill Cosby is ordered to stand trial in sex case

links

Total Votes: 460

og.description: Same-sex marriage, the most contentious political issue of our time, stirs strong feelings on both sides of the debate. Unfortunately, it also threatens to drag North Carolina’s 100 registers of deeds into territory where we don’t belong: making public policy.
